mapper.select: SELECT WORK_NO, WORK_DATE, WORK_IN, WORK_OUT, WORK_TOTAL_TIME, WORK_STATE, LATE_YN, EMP_NO FROM WORK WHERE WORK_DATE = TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE WORK SET LATE_YN = 'Y' WHERE WORK_DATE = #{today} AND WORK_IN > TO_TIMESTAMP('09:00:00', 'HH24:MI:SS') AND LATE_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO NOT IN ( SELECT EMP_NO FROM WORK WHERE WORK_DATE = TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORK ( WORK_NO , WORK_DATE , WORK_IN , WORK_OUT , WORK_TOTAL_TIME , WORK_STATE , LATE_YN , EMP_NO ) VALUES ( WORK_SEQ.NEXTVAL , TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , NULL , NULL , 0 , 40 , 'N' , #{empNo} )

SELECT W.WORK_NO, W.WORK_DATE, W.WORK_IN, W.WORK_OUT, W.WORK_TOTAL_TIME, W.WORK_STATE, W.LATE_YN, E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.ENTER_DATE FROM WORK W JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON W.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE W.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND W.WORK_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY W.WORK_DATE
